eighthSection.title: The latest news and resources on decentralized identity.

fifthSection.description: Get to know the technology behind our identity verification platform and how it is transforming digital identity as we know it.
fifthSection.subTitle: Introducing Gataca Studio
fifthSection.title: How it works

firstSection.description: Gataca provides simple, compliant, and secure decentralized identity management technology, also known as self-sovereign identity (SSI) technology.
firstSection.title: Issue, verify and manage identity credentials

advantages.description: User data and ID credentials are issued by trusted authorities and protected with biometrics and post-quantum cryptography to ensure they are tamper-proof, allowing instant identity verification without relying on centralized systems.
advantages.title: Reduce identity fraud

advantages.description: The operational cost of a KYC or onboarding process falls remarkably as the same data no longer needs to be verified multiple times across different services. Users hold pre-verified identity information and decide with whom to share their data and when to revoke access, instantly complying with data privacy regulations.
advantages.title: Save in compliance costs

advantages.description: SSI combines the simplicity and usability of a Single Sign-On with advanced cryptography that provides government-grade secured access to digital services, eliminating friction during onboardings and lowering abandonment rates.
advantages.title: Improve user experience

advantages.description: SSI can be used in both Web 2.0 and Web 3.0 instances and is the ideal partner to transition to a user-centric identity model.
advantages.title: Interconnect with Web 3.0

fourthSection.title: Unlock the potential of Self-Sovereign Identity for your organization

sixthSection.description: Uncover how Gataca can help you with your identity verification goals

list.description: Streamline compliant onboarding processes by enabling individuals to prove their identity and information in one click
list.title: Customer onboarding KYB)

list.description: Combine the simplicity of a Single Sign-On with government-grade secure identity systems to provide the best user experience
list.title: User authentication (SSO)

list.description: Provide secure access to your facilities in proximity scenarios, where you can seamlessly verify identity information in seconds
list.title: Physical access control

list.description: Issue tamper-proof digital certificates, qualifications, and other personal data and let users store them in a mobile ID wallet
list.title: Issuance of identity credentials

list.description: Automatically fill in signee information in documents and enable qualified electronic signatures
list.title: Signature of contracts and other documents

list.description: Conduct electronic voting for elections, corporate decisions, or membership voting in a secure and transparent way
list.title: Electronic voting
